tasks.task_description: Set up Node.js project with package.json (latest versions)
Set up ESLint and Prettier configuration
Create complete folder structure as per plan
Create base files with stub implementations
Set up Express app structure (app.ts, server.ts)
Create Dockerfile for Cloud Run deployment
Create test script to verify Firebase connection

description: Implement Phase 1 - Project Foundation for investor-match system with Firebase project ID: investor-match-30x
context: Initialized Git repository and created package.json with latest versions of Express, Firebase Admin SDK, TypeScript, and development tools
Created TypeScript config, ESLint/Prettier setup, and .env.example with Firebase project ID investor-match-30x
Created folder structure and Firebase configuration with project ID investor-match-30x
Created all base files with stub implementations, Express app structure, Dockerfile for Cloud Run, and Firebase test script
Phase 1 completed successfully - all project foundation tasks done including Git setup, Node.js/TypeScript config, Firebase integration, folder structure, stub implementations, and deployment setup
